mapper.insert: insert into tbl_funding (id, genre_type, investor_number, target_price, converge_price, file_content, funding_content, funding_status) values (#{id}, #{genreType}, #{investorNumber}, #{targetPrice}, #{convergePrice}, #{fileContent}, #{fundingContent}, '펀딩 중')
insert into tbl_funding_product (product_name, product_price, product_amount, funding_id) values (#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productAmount}, #{fundingId})
mapper.update: update tbl_funding set funding_status = '펀딩 종료' where funding_status = '펀딩 중'
